parameters.jsCode:
// Initialize pagination
return [{ json: { cursor: null, hasMore: true, allTasks: [] } }];

parameters.query:
=-- Upsert task
INSERT INTO printavo_tasks (printavo_id, name, due_date, completed_at, order_printavo_id, order_visual_id, created_at, updated_at)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.printavo_id }}',
  '{{ ($json.name || '').replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  {{ $json.due_date ? "'" + $json.due_date + "'" : 'NULL' }},
  {{ $json.completed_at ? "'" + $json.completed_at + "'" : 'NULL' }},
  {{ $json.order_printavo_id ? "'" + $json.order_printavo_id + "'" : 'NULL' }},
  {{ $json.order_visual_id ? "'" + $json.order_visual_id + "'" : 'NULL' }},
  NOW(),
  NOW()
)
ON CONFLICT (printavo_id) DO UPDATE SET
  name = EXCLUDED.name,
  due_date = EXCLUDED.due_date,
  completed_at = EXCLUDED.completed_at,
  order_printavo_id = EXCLUDED.order_printavo_id,
  order_visual_id = EXCLUDED.order_visual_id,
  updated_at = NOW()
RETURNING id, name;
